document_data.name: Whip Sash
document_data.mainbody: '''Whip sashes''' were special weapons used by [[Holy slayer]] [[assassin]]s in [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Description: Outwardly, these weapons appeared as regular [[silk]] [[sash]]es. Underneath the silk rested a [[leather]] sash that had metal [[wire]] with a steel tip.
document_data.Weaponology: These weapon were used in a similar manner to that of a [[Whip|horsewhip]] or a [[wikipedia:en:Garrote|garrote]].
document_data.Notable Users: * Whip sashes were a favored weapon among [[Moon-spinners]].
